---
category: news
title: "Fintech body mulls new code of conduct, to be adopted as framework for proposed self-regulatory organisation"
excerpt: "The Digital Lenders Association of India is planning to introduce within a month a new code of conduct, which will be adopted as a framework for its proposed self-regulatory organisation. The code will be applicable to over 80 fintech members of the industrial body, CEO Jatinder Handoo told FE."
